reference.title: Setting key names with the keys attribute
reference.shortdesc: A keys attribute consists of one or more space-separated keys. Map authors define keys using a topicref or topicref specialization that contains the keys attribute. Each key definition introduces an identifier for a resource referenced from a map. Keys resolve to the resources given as the href value on the key definition topicref element, to content contained within the key definition topicref element, or both.
